ğŸ“‹ CHECKLIST FOR FIRST-TIME BUILD
=============================================================================

Before building for the first time:

â˜ Python 3.8+ is installed
â˜ Virtual environment is activated (if using one)
â˜ Run: pip install -r requirements.txt
â˜ All files exist: initiative_viewer.py, templates/, static/
â˜ You have 2-4 GB free RAM
â˜ You have 500 MB free disk space

Then:

â˜ Double-click build_initiative_viewer.bat
â˜ Wait for "Build completed successfully!" message
â˜ Check that dist/InitiativeViewer.exe exists
â˜ Test the executable
â˜ Distribute to users with QUICK_START_EXECUTABLE.txt
